form.nota: Please complete all mandatory fields on this form.
form.name: Name
form.is_application_linked: Is this application linked to an existing one?
form.certify: I certify that I hope to earn an income of 12.000€ or more in the next 6 months and/or have means to support myself, my partner and dependents who accompany me during my stay in Cape Verde.
form.date_of_arrival: Date of arrival to Cabo Verde
form.convicted_crime: Have you ever been convicted of a serious crime
form.employement_description: Brief description of the type of work/ nature of the business in which the candidate will be involved
form.are_there: Are there any person(s) in the family group accompanied by you who would be defined as dependent?
form.see_definition: (see definition in General Information – Definition of terms)
form.valid_insurance: Do you have a valid insurance policy?
form.passport_photo_help: Upload your passport size photo (jpeg format)
form.other_details: Other details relevant to your application that you want to share.
form.declaration_text: I declare that I, or any member of my family group included in this application, do not come looking for a permanent job in Cabo Verde.
form.i_certify: I certify that the information provided by me in this form is true and correct, to the best of my knowledge. I understand and agree that any false information, misrepresentation or omission of facts in this application and during the application process may be a justification for refusing entry or revoking status.

erros.label: Please fix the following errors:
erros.issue_date_due: Passport Issue Date must be priot to Due Date
erros.issue_date_arrival: Passport Issue Date must be prior to Date of Arrival To Cabo Verde
erros.arrival_date_due: Date of Arrival must be prior to Passport Issue Date
erros.arrival_date_insurance_expiry: Insurance Expiry Date must be after Date of Arrival To Cabo Verde

email.invalido: You must enter a valid email.
email.confirmacao: Confirmation Email must be the same as Email

form.text: Please complete all required fields in this form. If you have a specific inquiry, please describe it in the "Comments" field, and we will respond promptly.
